title: daBNC
author: daBNC
content: Hi.I have a discord group for automated predictions of Esoccer Battle, Live Arena and GT League FIFA tips.They can be bet on bet365 and much more sites.If you are interested in this please join my group!Â  https://discord.gg/SaKZAXs8bZ

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: Free tips right? Because is not worth it paying for a subscription as most of the predictions are not accurate in most case, but then if it is a free tip one can still see it as a basis for analysis even without total reliance on them.

comments.author: daBNC
comments.body: Quote from: Ojima-ojo on May 22, 2023, 07:46:23 PMFree tips right? Because is not worth it paying for a subscription as most of the predictions are not accurate in most case, but then if it is a free tip one can still see it as a basis for analysis even without total reliance on them. On twitter I share free tips as well.Given that they're live tips which highly depends on the market/odds/game period I can't give any baseline or whatsoever to let people figure out their bets.Also it's automated, so 24/7 and no user behavior is behind the tips shared on the discord.
